sentences.english: The sight of George shedding crocodile tears made me sick.
sentences.chinese: 看到喬治假慈悲，我感到噁心。

sentences.english: You mean she was crying crocodile tears?
sentences.chinese: 你是說她只是貓哭耗子假慈悲？

sentences.english: Don't shed crocodile tears over his misfortune，I know you hate him.
sentences.chinese: 不要假惺惺的爲他的厄運假慈悲了，我知道你恨他。

sentences.english: Don't shed crocodile tears over his misfortune, I know you hate him.
sentences.chinese: 不要假惺惺地爲他的厄運假慈悲了，我知道你恨他。

sentences.english: He is a really shedding crocodile tears.
sentences.chinese: 他真的是鱷魚掉的眼淚，假慈悲。

definition: the cat weeps for the dead mouse (idiom); hypocritical pretence of condolence/crocodile tears
the cat weeps for the dead mouse (idiom); hypocritical pretence of condolence/crocodile tears
lit. a dog who catches mice/to be meddlesome (idiom)
Beware of suspicious folk bearing gifts, they are sure to be ill-intentioned. (idiom)
pinyin: huang2 shu3 lang2 gei3 ji1 bai4 nian2

definition: no ivory comes from the mouth of a dog (idiom)/no good words are to be expected from a scoundrel
pinyin: gou3 zui3 li5 tu3 bu4 chu1 xiang4 ya2

definition: a dog threatens based on master's power (idiom); to use one's position to bully others
lit. heart of wolf and lungs of dog (idiom)/cruel and unscrupulous
a dog biting Lü Dongbin (idiom)/to ill reward a person's kindness
pinyin: gou3 yao3 Lu:3 Dong4 bin1 , bu4 shi2 hao3 ren2 xin1
related.word: 狗咬呂洞賓，不識好人心

definition: completely lacking any feeling or sense of justice (idiom); cold and ruthless
